description: This table displays weblinks associated with discrete goal records.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WEBLINK_TEXT
columns.description: Reference link display text for the address specified by the WEBLINK_ADDRESS column.

columns.name: WEBLINK_ADDRESS
columns.description: Reference link address for the text specified by the WEBLINK_TEXT column.
